game.name: Dino Transport Truck Simulator 3D
game.description:
Transporting animals from one location to another cannot be handled by anyone else. It requires challenging your insane truck driving abilities and sharp hand-eye coordination skills to complete all driving tasks. Do you think that you can handle this task perfectly? Join Dino Transport Truck Simulator 3D and be prepared to pick an angry dino from the one location and drop him to the Jurassic zoo in the wild beast territory! Be careful as the most furious dinosaurs of the world are roaming all around the area!

This brand new racing challenge will give you a matchless and realistic jungle environment where you will get a chance to experience the real adventure. Follow all the yellow arrows shown on the screen to transport the dangerous dinosaurs on your truck! Stop your truck outside the cage of your dino and he will automatically get up on your vehicle! However, you are still advised to beware of the big wandering dinosaurs around otherwise you lose your game. Brace yourself to enter the ultimate adventure in this HTML5 truck game!

On one hand, your driving skills will be improved, it is so exciting to experience the real thrilling action on another hand. This transport truck simulation game features realistic dinosaurs attack animations and sounds, time deadline for each dino transportation task, multiple transporter trucks, real 3D safari jungle Zoo environment and physics-based realistic simulation. Good luck to complete all your tasks and become a pro in this cool online truck driving simulator!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Dino Transport Truck Simulator 3D at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
